document.full_text: the handover of control in july over two provinces and four cities is part of the first steps of transitioning power from nato to afghanistan by 2014.
document.title: afghans to take over security in 7 areas, mostly peaceful, by july
lines_and_colors: the handover of control in july over two provinces and four cities is part of the first steps of transitioning power from nato to afghanistan by 2014.
